GK16kunvjivu:3124: yathā rasaḥ kāvyasya rasavattāṃ tadvidāhlādaṃ ca vidadhātyevamupamādirapyubhyaṃ niṣpādayan rasavadalaṅkāraḥ saṃpadyate /
GK16kunvjivu:3126: upoḍharāgeṇa vilolatārakaṃ tathā gṛhītaṃ śaśinā niśāmukham /

GK16kunvjivu:3138: calāpāṅgāṃ dṛṣṭiṃ spṛśasi bahuśo vepathumatīṃ rahasyākhyāyīva svanasi mṛdu karṇāntikaracaḥ /
GK16kunvjivu:3139: karaṃ vyādhunvatyāḥ pibasi ratisarvasvamadharaṃ vayaṃ tattvānveṣānmadhukara hatāstvaṃ khalu kṛtī // VjivC_3.66 //
GK16kunvjivu:3152: na cālaṅkārāntare sati rasavadapekṣānibandhanaḥ saṃsṛṣṭisaṃkaravyapadeśaprasaṅgaḥ pratyākhyeyatāṃ pratipadyate /
GK16kunvjivu:3156: atra rasavadalaṅkārasya rūpakādīnāṃ ca saṃnipātaḥ sutarāṃ samudbhāsate /
GK16kunvjivu:3157: tatra “cumbatīva rajanīmukhaṃ śaśī“ti utprekṣālakṣaṇasya rasavadalaṅkārasya prādhānyenopanibandhaḥ /

GK16kunvjivu:3165: pāṇḍupayodhareṇārdranakhakṣatābhamaindraṃ dhanuḥ dadhāneti śleṣopamayośca tadānuguṇyena viniveśanāt (ca) /
GK16kunvjivu:3166: evaṃ sakalaṅkamapi prasādayantī parasyābhyadhikaṃ tāpaṃ cakāretyevaṃrūpaḥ prakāro hi rūpakālaṅkāranibandhanaḥ prakaṭāṅganāvṛttāntasamāropa (ramaṇīyaḥ)
GK16kunvjivu:3176: yadapi nīrasaprāyaṃ padārthajātaṃ tadapi sarvamanenaiva sarasatāmupapadyate /

GK16kunvjivu:3186: evaṃ nīrasānāṃ padārthānāṃ sarasatāṃ samullāsayituṃ rasavadalaṅkāraṃ samāsāditavān /

GK16kunvjivu:3208: yadi vā samānavibhaktīnāṃ bahūnāṃ kārakāṇāmekaṃ kriyāpadaṃ prakāśakaṃ dīpakamityucyate,

GK16kunvjivu:3456: evaṃvidhayā rūpakālaṅkārarekhayāpi tathā prasiddhyabhāvādeva niṣkampatayā vyavahartuṃ na yujyate /

GK16kunvjivu:3490: sāmyaṃ saṃbandhāntaraṃ vā samāśrityāprastutaṃ prastutaśobhāyai varṇanīyatāṃ yatra nayantīti /
GK16kunvjivu:3492: lāvaṇyasindhuraparaiva hi keyamatra yatrotpalāni śaśinā saha saṃplavante /

GK16kunvjivu:3497: sakalavākyavyāpakāprastutārthapraśaṃsodāharaṇaṃ yathā--- chāyā nātmana eva yā kathamasāvanyasya niṣpragrahā grīṣmoṣmāpadi śītalastalakṣuvi sparśo 'nilādeḥ kutaḥ /
GK16kunvjivu:3498: vārtā varṣaśate gate kila phalaṃ bhāvīti vārteva sā drāghimṇā muṣitāḥ kiyacciramaho tālena bālā vayam // VjivC_3.96 //
GK16kunvjivu:3501: indurlipta ivāñjanena jaḍitā dṛṣṭirmṛgīṇāmiva pramlānāruṇimeva vidrumalatā śyāmeva hemaprabhā /
GK16kunvjivu:3502: kārkaśyaṃ kalayā ca kokilavadhūkaṇṭheṣviva prastutaṃ sītāyāḥ purataśca hanta śikhināṃ barhāḥ saharhā iva // VjivC_3.97 //
GK16kunvjivu:3504: sītāyāḥ saṃbandhī śobhātiśayasaukumāryamanoharo mukhādyavayavasamūhaḥ prakṛtāṅgabhūtabhūṣaṇāntaropanibandhasahāyaḥ prastutapraśaṃsāṃ samarpayan sotkarṣaḥ pratīyate /
GK16kunvjivu:3507: parāmṛśita sāyakaṃ kṣipati locanaṃ kārmuke vilokayati vallabhāsmitasudhārdravaktraṃ smaraḥ /
GK16kunvjivu:3508: madhoḥ kimapi bhāṣate bhuvananirjayāyāvaniṃ gato 'hamiti harṣitaḥ spṛśati gātralekhāmaho // VjivC_3.98 //
GK16kunvjivu:3511: taṇṇatthi kiṃpi paiṇo pakappiaṃ jaṃ ṇa ṇiai gharaṇīe /
GK16kunvjivu:3513: tannāsti kimapi patyuḥ prikalpitaṃ yanna niyatigehinyā /
GK16kunvjivu:3524: evamaprastutapraśaṃsāṃ vicārya vivakṣitārthapratipādanāya prakārāntarābhidhānatvādanayaiva samacchāyaprāyaṃ paryāyoktaṃ vicārayati---
GK16kunvjivu:3529: “yadvākyāntaravaktavyaṃ” = vastu vākyārthalakṣaṇaṃ padasamudāyāntarābhidheyaṃ “tadanyena” = vākyāntareṇa yena “samarpyate” = pratipādyate /
GK16kunvjivu:3541: yatra vācyatayā nindā vicchittyai prastutasya sā /

GK16kunvjivu:3549: adyāpyatra ca nābhimānamasamaṃ rājaṃstvayā tanvatā viśrāntiḥ kṣaṇamekameva na tayorjāteti ko 'yaṃ kramaḥ // VjivC_3.101 //
GK16kunvjivu:3561: dinamavasitaṃ viśrāntāḥ smastvayā marukūpa he paramupakṛtaṃ vaktuṃ roṣaṃ hriyā na vayaṃ kṣamāḥ /
GK16kunvjivu:3562: bhavatu sukṛtairadhvanyānāmaśoṣajalo bhavā- niyamapi punaśchāyābhūyā tavopataṭaṃ śamī // VjivC_3.105 //

GK16kunvjivu:3879: yeyaṃ tulyayogitā nāma nāsāvalaṅkṛtiḥ yasmāt “etasyāṃ dvau bahavo vā padārthāḥ tulyayoginaḥ prakāratvamupapadyante,
GK16kunvjivu:3882: kiṃ kasya vibhūṣaṇaṃ syāt alaṅkaraṇaṃ bhavet /

GK16kunvjivu:3894: tathā ca rājānucareṣu svāmyapekṣayā bhṛtyabhāvaḥ svabhṛtyāpekṣayā svāmibhāvaśceti dharmadvayaṃ viruddhavyapekṣādvitayalakṣaṇasya rūpadvayasya vidyamānatvādupapannameva /
GK16kunvjivu:3897: bhūṣaṇatvaṃ na vāryate tulyayogitāprakāratvaṃ punarapasāryate ityāha---
GK16kunvjivu:3900: eteṣāṃ prastutānāṃ sā bhavatyupamitiḥ sphuṭam // Vjiv_3.41 //

GK16kunvjivu:3903: tataḥ kiṃ syādityatrāha---“sā bhavatyupamitiḥ sphuṭam” prakaṭā cāsāvalaṅkṛtiḥ sāmyasamanvayādisaṃvādādupamaiva nānyā kācidityarthaḥ /

GK16kunvjivu:3907: upamānaṃ prastutatvāt varṇanīyaṃ sāmyasamanvayātirekāt alaṅkaraṇāya kalpate yathā---

GK16kunvjivu:4072: na ca yatpratīyamānaṃ tadalaṅkaraṇaṃ tadvidāhlādakāritvāt iti yujyate vaktum /

GK16kunvjivu:4083: neyaṃ pūrvoktayā nītyā pratyekameva parasparaṃ dvayorapi bhūṣaṇabhāve pratyārakhāte parivṛttervibhūṣā saṃbhavati,
GK16kunvjivu:4097_1: tadeveti vā sādṛśyasya pratipādakaṃ vinā tatpratipādanapragalbhavākya prayogamāhātmyādutprekṣāyāḥ pratīyamānatvāt /
GK16kunvjivu:4098: yathā--- pavāṇa cala vijju ca duliṃ rāiāsu khanaanti me aāso uvāṇa urulisavdayami hiḷiāsuka jillai virahae /
GK16kunvjivu:4106: tataśca gatārthatvābhidhāyinaḥ śabdasyāprayogaḥ sākṣādvilocanarathavṛttirna bhavatītyupacārapāraṃparyeṇa tadviśeṣaṇatāṃ prāpyate /
GK16kunvjivu:4107_0: tathā ca dharmadharmibhāvalakṣaṇāyāḥ pratyāsatteḥ prathamaṃ svābhidheyalakṣaṇalakṣaṇāyā
GK16kunvjivu:4107_1: guṇamātreṇaiva tataśca sādṛśyanibandhanāyāḥ pratyāsattereva tatsadṛśe vilocanacchāyātiśayavṛttimāsādayati /
GK16kunvjivu:4108: tadviśeṣaṇatvādeva samāse 'smin nīlotpalaśabdasya pūrvanipātaḥ saptamīviśeṣaṇe bahuvrīhāviti /
GK16kunvjivu:4109: indumukhītyatra induriva mukhaṃ yasyāḥ sā tathoktā /
GK16kunvjivu:4112: yadi vā indumukhamiva mukhaṃ yasyāḥ sā tathoktetyatra induśabdastadekadeśe mukhe viśeṣaṇam (bhavati)
GK16kunvjivu:4119: induriva kāntaṃ mukhaṃ yasyāḥ sā indukāntamukhītyatra sāmānyaśabdasya śrūyamāṇatayā yuktirabhidhīyate /
GK16kunvjivu:4120: “induriva kāntamindukāntam” iti “upamānāni sāmānyavacanaiḥ” ityanena samāse vihite paścādindukāntaṃ mukhaṃ yasyāḥ sā tathokteti /
GK16kunvjivu:4121: sāmānyaśabdasya vṛttivākyayordvayorapi upapadyamānatvānna kenacinnyāyena śrūyamāṇatā vicārayituṃ pāryate,
GK16kunvjivu:4123: na punaranyeneti kutastasya śrūyamāṇavṛtteḥ pratīyamānatā kalpeta ? /
GK16kunvjivu:4129: sa cet kavikauśalakalpitāt prākārāntarāt pratipannaḥ tataḥ kiṃ śabdaprayogeṇa ? /
GK16kunvjivu:4142: tasminneva vākye stanāntaravartinorupamānopameyayoḥ sādṛśyasaṃbandhābhidhāyī punarivādiḥ prayujyate /
GK16kunvjivu:4149: vācakayukte tasminneva vākye tayorekatarasya dharmyantareṇa saha dharmāntaraṃ (ra)
GK16kunvjivu:4155: kvacitpadārthopamāyāmupameyānāmupamānānāṃ ca samasaṃkhyākānāṃ sūhadvaye prathamaṃ vivakṣitasamūhasaṃkhyābhedasamāhi (ta)
GK16kunvjivu:4156_1: vācake prayukte samudāyadharmāṇāṃ samudāyapūrvakatvāttu paścādeteṣāṃ pratyekaṃ svasaṃbandhinaṃ
GK16kunvjivu:4160: atra sparśollasaditi kriyāviśeṣaṇaṃ ceti dvābhyāṃ prakārābhyāmubhayaniṣṭhatayānyonyaṃ (sādhāraṇadharmasaṃbandhādupamānopameyabhāvaḥ) /
GK16kunvjivu:4161_1: varṇyamānavṛtterupameyatve tāvanmātraviśeṣaṇaiḥ svairviśiṣṭaṃ padārthāntaramupamānatāṃ yadā prāpnoti,
GK16kunvjivu:4169: upamādoṣaṇāṃ tu lakṣaṇasyeva sughaṭitatvāt dūrotsāritatvena neyārthādivadaparigaṇanam /
GK16kunvjivu:4180: “arthayoḥ” = vastunorabhidhīyamānayoḥ dvayoḥ satyabhūtayoḥ vākyārthatātparyasvarūpayoḥ “dhāryate” yasmin sa śleṣābhidhāno 'laṅkāraḥ /
GK16kunvjivu:4181: “tādṛgvācakavācyatā” = sa iva dṛśyate yaḥ sa tādṛgucyate,
GK16kunvjivu:4184: tādṛśārthavācakatvaṃ yatra yasmin so 'pi śleṣa ucyate /

GK16kunvjivu:5116: kiṃ bahunā, vicitrasaṃbhāvanāgahane nītivartmani vicakṣaṇaṃmanyasya rākṣasasyāpi tathā saṃbhramaḥ santāpamujjanayāṃbabhūve,
GK16kunvjivu:5125: yathā--- ta eva guṇāsta evābhyupāyāstadeva ca nītitantram,
GK16kunvjivu:5126: tathāpi kasyacidevāvikalakauśalaprasāritā ripukulasaṃyamanāya saṃghaṭanā aviditavividhabandhayuktā nītiprayuktā tadvidāmapi vimohamāvahati,
GK16kunvjivu:5128: tathā ca--- “rākṣasaḥ---bhadramukha asyāgnipraveśe suhṛdaste ko hetuḥ ?
GK16kunvjivu:5130: puruṣaḥ---ajja ṇahi ṇahi (ārya na hi na hi)

GK16kunvjivu:5151: anenaiva vividhavikalpanena yo 'yamarthaḥ samuddīpyamāno navatābhājanaṃ vibhūṣyamāṇaḥ san prikāśate /
GK16kunvjivu:5163: ekasya madhyavartyaṅkāntaragarbhokṛtaṃ garbho vā nāmeti yāvat /

GK16kunvjivu:5169: karpūra iva dagdho 'pi śaktimān yo jane jane /

GK16kunvjivu:5183: sāhaṃ dāṇiṃ mandabhāiṇī bhārirarie attāṇaṃ ṇikkhivissāmi” // VjivC_4.46 //

GK16kunvjivu:5214: kusumākarasuhṛdaḥ kandarpasya purandaroddeśāt gauryāḥ saundaryabalādvipraharato haravilocanavicitrabhānunā bhasmīkaraṇaṃ,
GK16kunvjivu:5224: asyaiva prādhānyamabhidhātuṃ vyatirekamāha--- “na tvamārgagrahagrastavarṇakāṅgaiḥ kadarthitam“---na tvaṅgānāṃ viniveśanaṃ vakratollāsabhāgbhavati /
GK16kunvjivu:5237: yathā śiśupālavadhe--- upendrasyendraprasthaṃ prati pratiṣṭhamānasya dvāravatīvyāvarṇanam /

GK16kunvjivu:5259: te hi tathāvidhavyasanakṣetrībhūtairapi punaḥ svapakṣopabṛṃhitaparākramaparājitaparipanthibhirbhujyata eṣā rājyaśrīriti akhidyamānā vipatsvapi vipulotsāhabhājo bhavantī /

GK16kunvjivu:5288: idamuktaṃ bhavatiḥ---itihāsodāhṛtāṃ kāñcana mahākaviḥ sakalāṃ kathāṃ prārabhyāpi,
GK16kunvjivu:5291: sa hi sargabandhaḥ dviṣāṃ vighātāya vidhātumicchato rahasyanujñāmadhigamya bhūbhṛtaḥ // VjivC_4.50 //
